sec.div: Calculation of AMOC and NPIW strengths
sec.p:
In our experiments, the calculation of AMOC strength refers to the maximum value of the Atlantic Ocean stream function in the upper 200–3000 m depths and 30°N northward
46, 61 . In addition, the NPIW (or NPDW) strength is calculated by the maximum value of meridional overturning stream function in the Pacific of 40–70°N, 0–3500 m depth (Supplementary Fig. 1).
